Title: Orruk Warboss
Intro: An Orruk Warboss is armed with one of the following weapon options: Boss Choppa and Boss Shield; Massive Choppa; or Pair of Boss Choppas.

Rules.Name: Shield
Rules.Rule: SHIELD: If this unit is armed with a Boss Choppa and Boss Shield, it has a Save characteristic of 3+ instead of 4+.

Rules.Name: Mount
Rules.Rule: MOUNT: This unit can have a War Boar mount that is armed with Jagged Tusks. If this unit has a War Boar mount, it has a Move characteristic of 9" instead of 5".

Rules.Name: Great Waaagh! Banner
Rules.Rule: GREAT WAAAGH! BANNER: If this unit does not have a War Boar mount, it can have a Great Waaagh! Banner. If this unit has a Great Waaagh! Banner, it gains the TOTEM keyword.

Rules.Name: War Boar Charge
Rules.Rule: ABILITIES Add 1 to wound rolls for attacks made with Jagged Tusks if the attacking unit made a charge move in the same turn.
